name: Rise Of Cassandra
description:
WATER IS RISING, STAND UP AS A DAM !

Cassandra lives in a peaceful village.

But everyone is scared of her. she had dreams, and in those dreams, waters rise.

And nobody survives.

And naturaaly, Nobody cares, villagers say she's mad.

But this morning, water rise...

Help Villagers and fight Aquatic Minions!

Maybe There is a way to contain rising water
